input.description: [required] Samplesheet (CSV file) with sample locations: S3 path to CSV file or set false

step.description: [required] starting step: mapping (default), markduplicates, prepare_recalibration, recalibrate, variant_calling, annotate

wes.description: [required] Enable when exome or panel data is provided: true, false

tools.description: [required] Tools to use: Germline variant/Somatic Variant calling, Annotation. See docs for available options

skip_tools.description: Disable specified tools. If DragMap is selected as aligner, it is recommended to skip baserecalibration with --skip_tools baserecalibrator

genome.description: [required] Name of iGenomes reference: GATK.GRCh38 (default), null

igenomes_ignore.description: Do not load the iGenomes reference config: true, false

aligner.description: [required] Specify aligner to be used to map reads to reference genome.: bwa-mem (default), bwa-mem2, dragmap

intervals.description: S3 path to target bed file in case of whole exome or targeted sequencing or intervals file.

no_intervals.description: Disable usage of intervals: true, false

split_fastq.description: Specify how many reads each split of a FastQ file contains. Set 0 to turn off splitting at all. default 5000000

fasta.description: S3 path to FASTA genome file. Note: path to FASTA genome is mandatory if genome is not specified

fasta_fai.description: S3 path to FASTA reference index.

save_output_as_bam.description: Saves output from mapping (if --save_mapped), Markduplicates & Baserecalibration as BAM file instead of CRAM: true, false

use_gatk_spark.description: Enable usage of GATK Spark implementation for duplicate marking and/or base quality score recalibration

trim_fastq.description: Run FastP for read trimming: true, false

concatenate_vcfs.description: Option for concatenating germline vcf-files: true, false

only_paired_variant_calling.description: If true, skips germline variant calling for matched normal to tumor sample. Normal samples without matched tumor will still be processed through germline variant calling tools: true,false

joint_germline.description: Turn on the joint germline variant calling for GATK haplotypecaller: true, false
